about.title: About hopes.icu
about.subtitle: A steady cadence of reusable engineering knowledge and gentle, human notes. We ship small, we iterate, we keep the spirit warm.

intro.title: Site Introduction
intro.paragraph1: Here, I try to treat life with an engineer's methodology: break down problems, validate hypotheses, record trade-offs, and iterate continuously. Technical writing emphasizes reusability and maintainability, while life writing emphasizes honesty and warmth.
intro.paragraph2: I write about: Next.js, performance optimization, engineering toolchains, UI/UX, animations and experiments. I also write about: learning lists, retrospectives, reading, and creative energy.

vision.title: Three Core Themes
vision.tech: Practical technology: From problem to solution, from trade-offs to implementation, emphasizing boundaries and choices.
vision.lab: Sustainable writing: Driven by weekly notes, lists, and experiments, not chasing trends but "reusable value".
vision.notes: Visible hope: Between vulnerability and resilience, leaving authentic traces and gentle expressions.
